website_summaries.verdict: A low-priced 2,000 mAh battery pack that charges with a cable.
pros: Unlike most battery packs, this one attaches to your controller and charges with the included 10' USB cable, allowing you to play and charge at the same time
The battery pack holds a charge for days of gaming
cons: A few customers have experienced melting battery packs

customer_reviews.title: Might buy another
customer_reviews.text: This works great and lasts SIGNIFICANTLY longer than any set of AA batteries or other rechargeable batteries. I changed it fully when I first got and a couple weeks ago and haven’t had to charge it again yet since then. It also comes with its own long charging cable which is a nice touch. What I thought was weird is that it doesn’t have the contacts on the inside so you can’t use the micro usb on the controller itself to charge it. Instead it has its own charging port that much be used. Not a huge deal just something I thought was odd.
customer_reviews.author: Just-Mike92

customer_reviews.title: Stays charged forever.
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. Stays charged for more than one days worth of gaming. I go 3 days without charging, then it charges super fast. Gotta say that I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: cstarke

customer_reviews.title: Great for Everything except full smartphone gaming experience
customer_reviews.text: Really like the big size of this battery and the nicely sleeved cable that came with it, but it's not that easy to install on the gamesir t2a controller and when installed the included phone bracket that comes with the controller cannot clamp on because the battery pack has a bulge that the bracket was not designed to hold. This has caused me to be using the bracket standalone with my phone, rather than be able to sit back and game with it above the controller. This could be the reason they sell the rechargeable battery separate but they should make a version 2 and just make the cutout for the battery and I will give this a five star.
customer_reviews.author: Powpow

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: * updated* This battery is still great however, I noticed that the battery reading on the xbox never showed that it was loosing power and just gave out while playing COD. It just gave up. Leaving me scrambling to find the charging cord. it lasted a little over 2 weeks with me playing about 1-2 hours at a time for about 3 days a week. I am still happy with the purchase just have to remember to keep the charging cord next to you when this happens. 3 days and still full charge battery is great! going to buy another for my second controller.
customer_reviews.author: MrMitch414

customer_reviews.title: Great battery, needs a redesign to fit the controller
customer_reviews.text: The battery live is greatly improved versed the standard recharables Microsoft sells. My only complaint is that the battery can easily “fall out” from the controller causing you to quickly scramble to put it back in when playing a game so I’ve “fix it” with a little duct tape.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis B.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I love the rechargable battery. Even works plugged in. Gamed all the way thru a 5 hr flight. I can't go with out it. So much better then having to replace batteries
customer_reviews.author: Charliemac10

customer_reviews.title: Not for people that set their conrtoller on their knee alot
customer_reviews.text: Mines well just buy eneloop AA's last longer and you dont deal with a giant bulge coming out of your controller for someone that puts their controller on their knee alot this make it fall of alot more not a fan
customer_reviews.author: i love quality goods

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for Xbox one x controller
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son to use with Xbox one x controller. It has worked great. Way better then using batteries. We used to go through batteries like crazy. Now he just charges it up and never runs out of charge power. Great controller battery pack.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fredrickson

customer_reviews.title: It died prematurely
customer_reviews.text: It Will not charge, only used 1x for 10 mins after full charge to verify it worked.I attempted to turn it on 2 days later controller will not power on with this battery anymore. this battery will not charge anymore.. Gave it a 2 star as it did work for 10 min test....
customer_reviews.author: Daniel K.

customer_reviews.title: Great battery pack and charging cable.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this about 6 months now. Still works like the day I got it. Holds a great charge. I got the 2000mah. Get a lot of gaming out of a single charge and when it does go dead they provide a long cable for easy charging while gaming or can be charged without being in the controller as well. which is nice when you only have one controller and 2 packs. Shape was a little weird to get used too but it isn’t a big deal. Just sticks out a little further. Got used to it quick and barely notice it now. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: After a year of consistent use
customer_reviews.text: ...This battery is holding up great. I have definitely saved enough money in batteries that this battery has paid for itself. I am having an issue with the battery just now beginning to lose connection to the controller on occasion, which causes the controller to temporarily lose power. Also the charging cable is extremely long and durable, but the tip has lost its grip so I suspect the hooks have been worn down from use. Overall an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Risorto

customer_reviews.title: Super good!
customer_reviews.text: Really good. Once you use these bigger batteries you never go back!
customer_reviews.author: FallToArms

customer_reviews.title: Xbox one controller battery pack
customer_reviews.text: So far the product works great love that comes with the long cable to charge while you can play and plus the battery is fully charge so I’m ready to play at once .
customer_reviews.author: Irv

customer_reviews.title: A great Battery
customer_reviews.text: I have stopped worrying about charging my controller since purchasing this battery this thing lasts a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Stephens

customer_reviews.title: The “missing” battery pack Microsoft should have included in the first place.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! The “missing” Xbox battery pack that Microsoft should have sold with their controllers in the first place. Seems to go forever between charging, hasn’t disappointed yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tony White

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect! Works great and the 10 foot cable is a bonus. Even charged while you play.. I don't see the charging light but that no big deal!! Thanks!! Will save money on regular batteries!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane White

customer_reviews.title: These are nice to have
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that's not as good is how it reads the battery on the xbox. It's always full. The red light blinks on the pack itself when it's dead.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Using this on Xbox one x and it lasts for a week with 2+ hours a day gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Cylon6

customer_reviews.title: Does everything well
customer_reviews.text: Battery fits perfectly and comes with a very nice 10ft charging cord. What more could you ask for
customer_reviews.author: IdahoPhil63

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great although it comes off without much effort. Needs to be made where it fits tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Mark Mangham

customer_reviews.title: Long life!
customer_reviews.text: It outlasts the Xbox rechargeable controller batteries, and definitely outlasted AA batteries by a longshot!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Long battery, nice cable
customer_reviews.text: I like the 10 foot cable, didnt think i would need 10 feet till i did. And lasts a long time, also really convenient how its own charging port, way better than the stands in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Moore

customer_reviews.title: Last long
customer_reviews.text: Great battery, lasts a really long time without a charge👌🔥
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: DESTROYED MY CONTROLLER
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY! product lasted a week then destroyed my Xbox one controller.
customer_reviews.author: ctschneiderjr

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product cable is longer then it really needs to be and the battery life lasts probably longer then they say it does
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting rechargeable Xbox one battery.
customer_reviews.text: Long Lasting rechargeable Xbox one battery. Very happy with the purchase easily last a 5 days of playing games for about 3-4 a day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saves money on batteries
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son because he was going thru all our batteries in no time. He is extremely happy with it. Says it holds a charge for a long time! Thank you for saving us lots of money! 😄
customer_reviews.author: Donna Serra

customer_reviews.title: Battery pack melted
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have any problems up until tonight. Had it plugged in to charge while the controller was on. Then my controller shut off and wouldn't turn back on, took out the battery pack to see it had melted.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Lasts forever.
customer_reviews.text: Loving this battery pack!!!! This extends the playability ten fold and just recharge when you eventually have to charge it. Lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Duguay

customer_reviews.title: Rip-off
customer_reviews.text: The battery holds a charge as well as the regular AAs you would use. Total rip-off.
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Fitment to my xbox elite controller (og version) is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Taurean W.

customer_reviews.title: AWSOME!
customer_reviews.text: I've had 2 batteries about 3yrs still going strong after 15-20hr gaming sessions. Dropped one in a sink of water! NUFF SAID.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Drac

product_meta.title: GameSir 2000mAh Xbox One Rechargeable Battery Pack Extended Power Bank for Xbox One/One S/One X/One Elite Wireless Controllers
product_meta.description:
Xbox One Controller Battery Pack 

Specifically designed for Xbox One X / Xbox One / Xbox One S / Xbox One Elite Controllers. Including a 2000mAh high capacity battery pack and a 10ft USB cable. The battery perfect fit for Xbox One wireless game controller. Gaming time doubled than the ordinary battery pack. You can charge your controllers when gaming, never worried about dead batteries. Easy installation by attaching to the back of the controller. A 10ft charging cord ensures controller still be using freely in your room while in charging. 
At MasTechBox, we create lasting products that help people benefit from the power of technology and make life better, easier and more fulfilling. 

Product Specifications: 

USB Cable Length: 10ft / 3m 
Color: Black 
Product Size: 2.16 x 1.38 x 1.06 inch 

MasTechBox Comprehensive Warranty: 

All MasTechBox products come with a 30-day money-back guarantee so our customers can purchase without worry. A happy customer experience is our #1 priority and so we also stand by our customers with a 12-month warranty. Simply contact us and we will happily send a replacement if any issues arise. 

Package Includes: 

1 x 2000mAh Xbox One Battery Pack 
1 x 10ft USB Cable 
1 x User Manual 

In addition, what you receive also include 30-day full refund, and 12-month warranty with friendly customer service.
feature_bullets: High Capacity: 2000mAh high quality rechargeable lithium battery for excellent performance, providing the maximum amount of energy for uninterrupted playing time up to more than continuous 20 hours.You need use 5v,1A adapter to charge it.
Compatible Devices: Xbox One X, Xbox One, Xbox One S and Xbox One Elite wireless official controller, can charge during game play or afterwards, allowing you to play games at any time.

10 feet USB Cable Included: Includes a 10 feet long USB to Micro USB data and charge cable, also allows you to move freely in your room while on charging. Gold-plated connector ensures fast speed charging. Nylon-braided material is sturdy and tangle-free.

Convenient LED indicator: Light indicator shows the charging status, Red: charging; Green: fully charged. Fully charged time is about 4 hours. You can unplug the USB cable when battery is fully charged.

User friendly：Charge & play design, this Charge & Play Kit for Xbox One Controllers is easily attached and detached, a must accessory to extend your playtime, no worry having to swap the disposable batteries out in the middle of a game. Please note that Xbox One controllers are not included.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars111 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
